website_summaries.verdict: If you're willing to work with the tedious upper rack, sleek design and solid performance make the FGID2466QF a fine budget-friendly dishwasher.
pros: The smudgeproof stainless-steel finish helps the $650 Frigidaire Gallery FGID2466QF look like a much more expensive dishwasher
It backs up those looks with quality cleaning performance and plenty of cycles to choose from
cons: The interior of the FGID2466QF doesn't have a lot of features to help you load your dishes
In fact, the arrangement of the upper rack makes fitting your bowls and glasses particularly tedious

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this, a lemon
customer_reviews.text: Died 9 months to the day after purchase. Contacted Frigidaire warranty support via chat on their website, they had someone out the next week. Turned out that water got into the area where the control board is, and shorted out the control board (pictures attached). Technician said he has seen this before. Go figure - who would expect water getting into a dishwasher. I'm probably going to try and use silicone to seal the enclosure contact points so this won't happen again, but I think it's only a matter of time. Looks like poor design. Recommend avoiding this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Gunther Sanderson

customer_reviews.title: Dishwasher does not dry dishes
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice looking unit but it does not dry dishes and leaves soap residue throughout interior I was told by Frigidaire that I may have to pay for a service call even though I have only used it 6 times very bad experience so far
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Avoid at all cost!
customer_reviews.text: We have all Frigidaire kitchen appliances and would not recommend them to anyone. The dishwasher is a constant problem. It doesn’t turn on more than it does, and this has been an issue since the time of installation. We have had draining problems multiple times. Even the wheels are junk. It’s a spawn of hell!
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Lemon
customer_reviews.text: I've had this dishwasher for 2.5 years, and have had to replace the heat sensor 3 times. It's out again, and I'm not paying for one more replacement part. Also, I made the mistake of hiring a repairman off of Thumbtack to fix it once, so Frigidaire will not consider accepting that it's a lemon since I didn't use an authorized repair person. I literally hate this dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth McCormack

customer_reviews.title: Sucked for me.
customer_reviews.text: This has never worked right for me. From day 1, (which was maybe 3 years ago) it has never dried the dishes. So if u ever ran the dishwasher before leaving for a trip etc then the thing is going to have water in it until u return. It was unattached and unused for a year and after hooking back up doesn’t drain. Had several people look at it. It’s dumb.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a piece of junk. We have replaced the circuit board 2 times now. Broken again, so throwing it out!!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Welch

customer_reviews.title: NOT RECOMMENDED
customer_reviews.text: I've had this model for about 2 years and it's been broken more than it's worked. Throwing codes constantly, dishes barely cleaned..just a waste of space and money!
customer_reviews.author: MegZ

customer_reviews.title: Huge waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Huge waste of money! Do not buy this machine! Frigidaire machines leave a gritty residue on all the dishes. Ours had electrical problems from the start, and even though we bought the extended warranty and had service technicians at our house for 6 weeks in a row and qualified for a replacement machine, Frigidaire refused to honor the warranty. My mother-in-law had the same problem with a Frigidaire dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and don't buy this machine-or any Frigidaire product
customer_reviews.text: This dishwasher self-destructed in less than three months of light use. Frigidaire's warranty service is laughably bad. The rotating arm is badly designed and fell off almost every cycle - until it finally fell on the heating element and melted. Frigidaire could not provide a service rep with phone access, would not provide replacement parts in less than two weeks and expected the customer to wait around for days for service or repair.
customer_reviews.author: Maddybee

customer_reviews.title: I will be buying another brand and I strongly recommend you do as well
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY FRIGIDAIRE. I bought a Frigidaire dishwasher just over one year ago and have used it under 25 times. Even when it worked it was a constant struggle but now it doesn't work at all and they want $350.00 to replace the needed part. I say hell no, I will be buying another brand and I strongly recommend you do as well. If you do one thing today, listen to this review and do not buy Frigidaire products.
customer_reviews.author: jakiyaful

customer_reviews.title: This is a terrible machine.
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible machine.. Claims to be quite? Well yes it was quite for the first 4 months then developed a terrible ginding sound. Then the draining I mean "not draining " problem started. Another repair call! Steer clear this machine is awful.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy R Fassino

customer_reviews.title: Dishwasher Failed after only 3.5 years
customer_reviews.text: I bought the dishwasher plus the matching refrigerator, microwave and stove oven in April 2016. The dishwasher latch broke last week, which then destroyed the circuit board so nothing works. Piece of garbage! The refrigerator "water hose" on the front door came off and flooded the floor 1 year after we bought it. Had to take the whole door panels off to fix it. The microwave has the most annoying beeper of any I've owned. No quick beep-beep, just a load, continuous tone like a fire alarm that continues on and on like it is an emergency you get the food out. Very poor products.
customer_reviews.author: J. Riggs

product_meta.title: 24" Built-In Dishwasher, Stainless Steel
feature_bullets: Polymer Tall-Tub Interior W/ Nylon TufRacks
OrbitClean Technology Provides 4 Times More Water Coverage
